title: sometimes there is a hang on login due to mailservers
body:
when it happens, it keeps querying over and over


This is "only" an issue when the account that's logging in, has joined chats. E.g. logging in, joining a chat, logging out, then logging in again will reproduce the issue.

To avoid this, leave every chat before logging out/quitting app
